QuestData.Title: Down Into the Chasm
QuestData.Description: Down below in Needlerock Chasm is where the mystics are sprouting all of these fungal monstrosities. I sent Slate Quicksand and a small force to deal with it, but they've run into a snag.$B$BYou remember the Arch Geomancer? Would you fly down there to the northeast and lend him a hand?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Slate Quicksand at Needlerock Chasm in Deepholm.
QuestData.RewardText: Good to see you again, $n. Now we'll get somewhere.
